channel.title: CVE Feed for PowerDNS -- pdns-recursor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PowerDNS -- pdns-recursor

item.title: CVE-2017-15120|2024-08-05T19:50:16.333Z -- powerdns -- pdns-recursor
item.description: An issue has been found in the parsing of authoritative answers in PowerDNS Recursor before 4.0.8, leading to a NULL pointer dereference when parsing a specially crafted answer containing a CNAME of a different class than IN. An unauthenticated remote attacker could cause a denial of service.
